pattern.name: Guided Tour
pattern.author: Martijn van Welie
pattern.problem: Users need to learn about how they can do 'something'
pattern.context: The site has uncommon features or deals with the usage of non-website related stuff. For example, when users have to learn about using a machine or performing maintenance.
pattern.pattlet: Show users how to do it in several interactive steps
pattern.solution: A guided tour is a -type of thing. The thing that is to be learned is taught is several main steps that are listed so that the users can understand this. The users can select a step and read/see all about this step. To make the learning experience even stronger, users can interact in each step and 'perform' some actions that simulate real usage.
pattern.rationale: This is to closest thing to having somebody sit next to you and go through a complex thing.
